Rudik decided to run his own business, and since 2003 he has engaged in a coffee business. He buys coffee from wholesale markets in Yerevan and resells it in a rented place in Ijevan market. He also offers to grind his clients' coffee for free. This proposal helped him to increase the number of customers so now he needs to add to the volume of his coffee.

Thanks to his business, Rudik is solving his family's needs and helping his pensioner parents. He has received loans from Nor Horizon 4 times and has never delayed his repayments. Rudik needs an 800,000 AMD loan to buy a lot of new varieties of coffee for his business.

loans.use: To buy new varieties of coffee.

loans.name: Eda Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Eda, famosa en su vecindario por sus sopas deliciosas y gustosas, habita en la ciudad de Granada, tiene 49 años edad, madre de 4 hijos, ella es comerciante, tiene una pulpería y elabora sopa los fines de semana. Ella inicio su negocio a los 25 años con una mini pulpería y venta de comida la que fue creciendo poco trabajando con pequeños créditos, lo ha ido muy bien pero ella siente que su negocio de venta de comidas (sopas, fritos) es donde mas demanda tiene de parte de sus clientes, su negocio lo tiene en su hogar en donde cada día trabaja fuerte por salir adelante y dar lo mejor en su cocina. Al igual que desea poder mejorar su pulpería la cual necesita mas productos que ofrecer.  
Ella requiere el préstamo para comprar arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabón, detergentes, dulces, pan, huevos, salsas, enlatados y verduras que son parte de los ingredientes que utiliza para hacer sus deliciosas sopas. Con la inversión podrá surtir su pulpería de productos de los cuales ya no tienen, y son solicitados por sus clientes además de mejorar sus ventas, y salir adelante, ya que le gustaría tener un comideria con mesas y sillas donde sus clientes se sienten a probar sus sopas, hecha por ella misma y al mismo tiempo ofrecer productos de su pulpería.
texts.en:
Doña Eda is famous in her neighborhood for her delicious and tasty soups.  She lives in the city of Granada, and is 49 years old.  She is the mother of four children and is a businesswoman; she has a general store, and makes her soup on weekends.  

She began her business at age 25 with a mini-general store and selling meals.  She was able to grow it a little by taking out some small loans.  It's gone very well for her, but she feels that her business selling meals (soup, fried foods) is where she has most customer demand.

She runs her business from her home, where she works hard every day in order to move ahead in life and to be able to do the best she can with her cooking.  She has an equal desire to be able to improve her grocery store, where she needs to offer more products for sale.

She is requesting the loan for purchasing rice, beans, sugar, oil, soap, detergents, desserts, bread, eggs, sauces, canned goods and vegetables, which are some of the ingredients that she uses for making her delicious soups.  With the investment, she will be able to stock up her grocery store with products she doesn't currently have and those that are requested by her customers, so as to improve her sales and move ahead in life.

She would like to have an eatery with tables and chairs where her customers could sit down while they try her home-made soups, and at the same time she could offer for sale products from her general store.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, oil, soap, detergent, desserts, bread, eggs, sauces, canned goods and vegetables, which are some of the ingredients that she uses for making her delicious soups.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: María Luisa, 53 años de edad, es una humilde comerciante y zapatera, originaria de la ciudad de Granada, ella solo estudio la primaria por condiciones de pobreza no siguió estudian se dedico a trabajar, ella es madre de 5 hijos todos  independientes. Inicio su experiencia de comerciante vendiendo ropa y zapatos con el apoyo de su hermana quien el enseño a vender y le presento clientes para que ella fuera adquiriendo su propia clientela, ella vende en los pueblos aledaños de la ciudad de Granada, luego adquirió experiencia en la elaboración artesanal de zapatos de cuero para hombre, ahora ella junto con su esposo se dedican a la elaboración y venta de zapatos de varón, ella vende sus zapatos en las ciudades de Masaya y León. Ella solicito el préstamo para comprar materia prima tales como cuero, suelas, mostasia, rollal, vaquetas, para elaborar zapatos. Con la compra de esta materia prima podrá tener mas material para elaborar y producir mas zapatos y logra una de sus metas que es expandirse en mas ciudades y poder comprar una maquina semi industrial para coser zapatos que le gustaría comprar en lo futuro, ya que etas son un poco caras y necesita ahorrar lo suficiente para poder adquirirla.
texts.en:
María Luisa, 53, is a humble businesswoman and cobbler, a native of the city of Granada.  She only went to elementary school.  For reasons of poverty she didn't continue studying, she worked.  She is the mother of five children, all of them on their own.

She began her business experience selling clothes and shoes with the help of her sister, who taught her to sell and introduced her to customers so she could acquire her own clientele.  She sells in the towns near the city of Granada.  Later she acquired experience making handcrafted leather shoes for men.

Now, she and her husband work making and selling men's shoes.  She sells her shoes in the cities of Masaya and León.

She requested the loan to buy materials such as leather, soles, beads, shoe polish, and calfskin to make shoes.  With the purchase of these items she will be able to have more material to make and produce more shoes, and realize one of her goals, which is to expand into more cities and be able to buy a semi-industrial machine to sew shoes.  She would like to buy this machine in the future, since they are somewhat expensive and she needs to save the necessary amount to be able to get it.

loans.use: to buy materials such as leather, soles, beads, shoe polish, and calfskin, to make shoes.

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es: Jose de 43 años de edad, habitante de la ciudad de Granada, casado, padre de dos hijos, el es un sencillo comerciante, que se dedica a la venta y elaboración de ladrillos y bloque. Empezó esta actividad  desde los 15 años de edad, junto con su papa quien le enseño a elaborar bloques y ladrillos, luego este negocio paso  a sus manos, el distribuye su productos en el mercado local de la ciudad, ferreterías que son sus puntos de ventas mas fuertes. El solicito el préstamo para comprar herramientas tales como canaletas, carretillas, materia prima como cemento, piedrín materia prima que utiliza para elaborar bloques, además le ayudaría porque tiene que pagar mano de obra. El desea tener una bloquera para distribuir en fuera de la ciudad de Granada y poder comprar maquinaria moderna para hacer bloques y ladrillos ya por ahora lo hace de manera manual.
texts.en: Jose is 43 years old, from Granada, is married, and has two children. He makes and sells bricks and blocks. He started doing so since he was 15 years old with his father who taught him how to make bricks and blocks. He then inherited the business. He distributes his poducts in the central market of the city in hardware store where he sells the most.  He requested the loan to buy tools such as pipes, wheel barrows, materials such as cement, rocky material which is used to makes blocks, and manual labor. He wishes to have a shop to distribute outside of Granada and buy modern machinery instead of making his products manually.

loans.use: buy tools such as pipes, wheel barrows, materials such as cement, rocky material which is used to makes blocks, and manual labor.

loans.name: Arman

texts.en:
Arman is 28 years old. He is single and lives with his parents in Vanadzor city. His brother lives and works in the Russian Federation and shares the expenses of his family in Armenia. 

For more than 4 years Arman has been building and selling brick ovens, fireplaces and barbecue braziers. His work is in high demand and he is famous as a brick maker in the province of Lori marz. He has orders from Vanadzor and different nearby cities. 

Arman is very fond of his profession and, thanks to brick construction, he is able to take care of a family himself, so as he confessed he decided to marry in the near future. 

Arman is asking from Kiva a 300,000 AMD loan to buy a new multifunctional tool (machine) for his brick activity.

loans.use: To buy a new multifunctional tool (machine)

loans.name: Auxiliadora Del Socorro

texts.es: Auxiliadora, una mujer fuerte y luchadora, de 44 años de edad, con mirada cansada pero con ánimos activos por salir adelante, es una comerciante que se dedica a vender ropa interior en el mercado de la ciudad de Granada. Cuando ella inicio no tenia un tramo ni local, ella vendía de manera ambulante, ofreciendo camisetas, calcetines, toallas y ropa interior recorría todo el mercado en busca de clientes para ofertar su producto y de esta manera paga los gastos del hogar, puso a sus hijos en el colegio, los vistió, pues a ella le toco ser madre y padre para ellos. Hoy en día tiene su propio tramo en el mercado donde ofrece su ropa. Ella requiere el préstamo para comprar ropa interior nueva al por mayor, para vender mas, pues la época navideña esta cerca y necesita mercadería nueva que ofrecer. Ella le gustaría poder mejorar su tramo ya que las condiciones en las que esta actualmente está en deterioro y necesita repararlo poco a poco.
texts.en: Auxiliadora is a strong and tenacious, 44-year-old woman.  She has a tired look but has the active intention of getting ahead in life.  She is a saleswoman who sells underwear in a market in the city of Granada.  When she started out, she didn't have a stand or a sales location.  She used to sell her goods as an itinerant vendor, selling t-shirts, socks, towels and underwear.  She would go round the whole market looking for customers to sell her products to.  This was how she covered her household expenses, put her kids through school and dressed them, as it was her job to be both mother and father to them.  These days, Auxiliadora has her own stand in her market where she sells her clothes.  She needs this loan to buy new underwear wholesale so that she can sell more as the Christmas season is near and she needs new merchandise to sell.  She would like to be able to improve her stand as it is currently in a bad state of repair and she needs to gradually fix it.

loans.use: to buy new underwear wholesale

loans.name: Maria Veronica

texts.es: María Veronica, tiene 39 años de edad, casada, tiene un hijo de 19 años de edad, ella es comerciante, tiene una pulpería en su casa de habitación. Inicio este negocio a los 29 años de edad, inicio con tan solo una mesa y pocos productos para ofrecer pero con el pasar del tiempo ha venido progresando su pulpería, ha logrado preparar a su hijo, mantener los gastos del hogar y lograr tener sus propios ingresos. Pero siente que necesita poder vender y surtir mas su tienda, es por ello que solicita el préstamo para comprar granos básicos, aceite, enlatados, jugos, productos de limpieza, carnes, huevo, pan, leche. Productos que se mueven rápido y de los cuales necesitan mantener surtida su pulpería para vender mas y mejorar sus ingresos, pues en lo futuro le gustaría tener su distribuidora de productos varios.
texts.en: María Veronica is 39 years old, married, and has a 19-year-old son.  She is a shop keeper and has a grocery store in her home.  She started this business when she was 29 years old with just a table and a few products to sell.  However, over the years she has gradually made progress with her store, managed to educate her son, covered her household expenses and managed to make her own income.  She feels that she needs to further stock her store and sell more.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan to buy basic grains, oil, canned food, juice, cleaning products, meat, eggs, bread and milk.  These are products that sell quickly and with which she needs to keep her store stocked so that she can sell more and improve her income.  In the future, she would like to have a wholesale store and sell a variety of products.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, oil, canned goods, juice, cleaning products, meat, eggs, bread and milk

loans.name: Vache

texts.en:
Vache is 30 years old. He lives with his wife, 2 sons and parents in Vanadzor city. For about 6 years he has produced wooden doors and windows, hangers, skirting boards, wooden angles and many other accessories which are made from wood. Vache rents a workshop near his house and runs his production work there.

His wooden products are sold in different furniture and building materials stores in Vanadzor and Gyumri cities. Vache also has a lot of individual orders. Most of them are his old clients who prefer to buy his hand made wooden accessories.   

Vache needs a 600,000 AMD loan to buy wood raw materials and a more powerful motor (engine) for his tool (machine) which will facilitate and accelerate his production.

loans.use: To buy wood raw materials and a motor (engine).

loans.name: Las Pasionarias Group

texts.es:
El comité Las Pasionarias nace mediante la gestión y el apoyo D. otro comité que se encontraba trabajando en dicho lugar. Este comité es D. la Ciudad D. San Lorenzo, las integrantes del comité fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento D. cada una D. ellas en lo personal como laboral.
La Señora Ana es la presidenta del grupo, tiene 40 años, es una mujer casada, tiene 2 hijos, es una mujer muy emprendedora y capaz D. liderar un grupo numeroso como lo es este, durante todos estos ciclos ha demostrado ganas D. superación. Ella tiene una mercería donD. vente todo tipo D. artículos, como ser artículos para regalos, cuadernos, zapatos y demás.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. los productos que venD., como zapatos, artículos para regaos y demás con lo que podrá surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
The communal bank Las Pasionarias was created by the management and support of another committee that was operating in that location. This communal bank is the Ciudad D. San Lorenzo. The members of that communal bank set personal and professional growth of each woman as their primary goal. 

Ana is the president of Las Pasionarias. She is 40 years old, married, and has two children. She is a very hardworking woman and capable of leading a large group such as this. During all of the loan cycles she demonstrated the desire to succeed. She has a store where she sells all types of things, like presents, notebooks, shoes, etc. 

She is asking for a loan to buy products to sell, like shoes, gift items, and other things so that she will be able to stock her store.

loans.use: to buy shoes, gift items, and other things.

loans.name: Primavera Group

texts.es:
Este Comité se formó gracias a una de las miembros. El motivo por el cual esta miembro se esforzó en formar este grupo fue la de querer ayudar a cada una de ellas ya que todas tienen ganas de salir adelante por todo el esfuerzo que están realizando en este pequeño lapso de tiempo que llevan dentro del comité, así también tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante. El comité cuenta con veinte 16 integrantes en donde todas tienen una pequeña actividad a la cual se dedican por mas pequeña que sea.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Maura, ella se dedica a la venta de artículos de primera necesidad, como ser fideos, arroz, panificados y demás con lo cual obtiene los ingresos para ayudar a su familia con los gastos diarios. Ella quiere seguir invirtiendo en su negocio por lo que solicita el préstamo.
Solicita la ayuda de la fundación para la compra de fideos, arroz, panificados y demás para el abastecimiento de su local.
texts.en:
This bank was formed thanks to one of the members.  This member made the effort to form this group because she wanted to help each one of them, since they all want very much to get ahead.  For all the effort they are making in this short period of time they've had the bank, she also wants very much to get ahead.  There are 16 bank members, and they all have a little job they work on, no matter how small.

One of the members is Maura.  She sells household necessities like vermicelli, rice, breads, and others, with which she gets the income to help her family with the daily expenses.  She wants to continue investing in her business, which is why she is requesting the loan.

She is requesting the foundation's support to buy vermicelli, rice, breads, and other products to supply her place.

loans.use: to buy sugar, vermicelli, breads, and other products.

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es: Gladis, tiene la edad  de 48 años, está casada y vive con sus hijos y su esposo  actualmente. Ella pretende con el crédito realizar la compra cerdos para engordarlos. Ella cuenta con el local apto para la explotación adecuada de cerdos, además ella a trabajo con estos animales desde varios años atrás por lo cual quiere invertir comprando unos para luego venderlos al mercado de la localidad. Ella tiene como meta generar las ganancias para salir adelante con los pagos del crédito y mejorar cada día su estabilidad económica y su bienestar familiar. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Gladis is 48 years old, married, and currently lives with her husband and children.  She plans to use this loan to buy pigs to fatten.  She has a suitable location for raising the pigs and, furthermore, she has been working with these animals for several years.  She would like to invest in buying some pigs which she will later sell in the local market.  Her goal is to make profits with which she will make her loan repayments and also improve her financial stability and her family well-being.

This is the first loan that Gladis has received from FUDECOSUR.  She has not received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered her this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy pigs to fatten

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy grocery items

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: Miguel, tiene la edad  de 67 años, está casado y vive con su esposa que es su mayor prioridad. El con el crédito pretende comprar pollos para el engorde y compra de los insumos para el crecimiento adecuado de ellos. El tiene la experiencia necesaria para retomar de nuevo el proyecto y generar ganancias para su bienestar. El tiene como meta aumentar las ganancias para el bienestar de su familia y mejorar cada día su nivel económico.   Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Miguel is 67 years old, married, and lives with his wife who is his main priority.  He plans to use his loan to buy chickens to fatten and also supplies to help them grow adequately.  Miguel has the experience he needs to restart this project and make profits for his well-being.  His goal is to increase his profits for the well-being of his family and to improve his financial situation.

This is the first loan that Miguel has received from FUDECOSUR.  He hasn't received previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR have offered him this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy chickens to fatten

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Hugo Dario

texts.es:
Don Hugo tiene 43 años, está casado y tiene 2 hijos. Es comerciante desde hace más de 15 años, empezó vendiendo primeramente las orquídeas con su mamá, mientras que su señora administraba una pequeña despensa en su casa,  y con el pequeño ahorro que pudo juntar de sus ganancias y hacerse de capital propio, empezó a comprar las orquídeas y formar su propia clientela que hoy por hoy se encuentra centralizada en Argentina.
 El Sr. Hugo comenta que sus ingresos son muy buenos y sus ventas aumentaron ya que cumple con la exigencia que su clientela requiere. El solicita el crédito para la compra de flores (orquideas) para poder seguir con su negocio. Don Hugo agradece a fundación paraguaya y Kiva por el apoyo constante que les brinda para fortalecer su microempresa y a la vez espera recibir siempre tan valioso apoyo.
texts.en:
Hugo, 43, is married and has two children.  He has been a businessman for more than 15 years.  He first began selling orchids with his mother, while his wife ran a little store in their home.  With the little savings he managed to get together from their profits and turn into his own capital, he began to buy orchids and get his own clientele, which at the moment is centralized in Argentina.

Hugo comments that his income is very good and his sales increased, since he satisfies his customers' demands.

He is requesting the loan to buy flowers (orchids) to be able to continue with his business.

Hugo is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva for their constant support to strengthen his micro-business.  At the same time, he hopes to always receive such valued support.

loans.use: to buy orchids for later sale.

loans.name: Solar Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres Solar  está formado por 20 integrantes todas del Barrio Solar de la Ciudad de Villa Elisa, actualmente se encuentran en el sexto ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres emprendedoras de la Fundación. Este grupo tiene muy buena comunicación, solidez y solidaridad.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Elva, ella se dedica a la venta de joyas de plata de todo tipo. Comenta que gracias a este trabajo y a su habilidad en las ventas  ha logrado salir  adelante y de este modo ayudar a su familia y cubrir los gastos diarios.
Ella solicita a la fundación y a kiva el crédito para la compra de platería con lo cual podrá seguir cumpliendo con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The Comité de Mujeres Solar is made up of 20 members, all of them women from the Barrio Solar in the city of Villa Elisa. They are currently in their sixth loan cycle in the Fundación Paraguaya's program for women entrepreneurs. The group has great communication and is very unified and supportive.
One of the members is Elva. She sells silver jewelry of all sorts. She says that this work and her talent for sales have helped her improve her family's lives and cover their everyday expenses.
She is requesting a loan from the Foundation and Kiva to buy silver jewelry to meet her customers' demands.

loans.use: to buy silver jewelry to sell.

loans.name: Kuña Kyrey Group

texts.es:
El Comité D. Mujeres D. nombre Kuña Kyrey, se conformó en el año 2007, gracias a una D. las miembros, la cual quedó muy interesada con la promoción que la asesora realizó en la zona, quien a su vez le comentó la forma D. trabajo en el grupo  y  así que conformaron su grupo. Contactaron con la asesora y se reunieron 17 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el ciclo 14, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa. Es un grupo que se destaca por trabajo en conjunto y solidario que realizan.
Una D. las integrantes es la señora D. la Nieve, ella se dedica a la venta D. quesos. Este trabajo lo realiza desD. hace ya un tiempo, por lo que ya tiene una clientela bien formada que siempre le solicita sus quesos. Este trabajo le trae buenos ingresos por lo que le gustaría poder seguir con este negocio, pues es el sustento D. su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. quesos, para que D. esa forma pueda tener  más D. sus productos y pueda D. esa forma cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
The communal bank Kuña Kyrey was formed in 2007 thanks to one of the members who took interest in a promotion carried out by an agent in the area.  She learned how to set up a work group and the 17 women formed a group and are now working on their 14th cycle together, supporting each other within the program.

The group stands out for the joint, supportive work they carry out.  

One of the members is Mrs. D. la Nieve who sells cheese.  She has been in business for a long time and has a good number of customers who always request her cheese.  Since her job produces a good income she would like to continue with the business in order to support the family.

She is requesting a loan to buy cheese so she will have more products to offer to her customers.

loans.use: To buy cheese to sell.

loans.name: Alberto Miguel

texts.es:
Alberto tiene 24 años,  vive con su madre, es soltero, se dedica a la venta ambulante de colchas, hamacas, y demás en la zona metropolitana, específicamente en la zona de la ciudad de Luque y alrededores. Al terminar su ciclo básico de la enseñanza escolar se dedicó a la profesión ya que su mamá es madre soltera, y de esta forma podrá ayudarla con los gastos de la casa. El es muy sacrificado ya que realiza las ventas casa por casa recorriendo varios kilómetros en su moto.
Comenta que aprendió la profesión de su tío ya que antes salía con él y lo inculcó para que se dedique de lleno en la venta para que así pueda crecer como persona y como profesional, y de esa manera poder ayudar a su madre quien prácticamente ha quedado a su cargo y juntos tratan de sobresalir económicamente día tras día.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de colchas, hamacas y demás con lo cual podrá abastecer su stock y de esa forma cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Alberto, 24, lives with his mother and is single.  He is a street vendor selling bedspreads and hammocks in the metropolitan area, specifically in the city of Luque and nearby areas.  When he finished his elementary education he began working with his mother who is single.  This way he could help cover household expenses.  He is very self-sacrificing and sells door to door traveling several kilometers on his motorcycle.

He says he learned the trade from his uncle who taught him how to dedicate his time to selling so he could grow into a professional and help his mother, who practically depends on him for getting ahead economically on a daily basis.

He is requesting a loan to buy bedspreads, hammocks and other items to add to his stock so he can meet customers'  requirements.

loans.use: To buy bedspreads and hammocks to sell.

loans.name: Kunakuera Katupyry Group

texts.es:
Este grupo es D. la ciudad D. Encarnación, surgió por contacto D. una D. las señoras con la fundación, la cual motivo a sus amigas y vecinas para formar parte del programa D. fundación paraguaya. El grupo se encuentra en el tercer ciclo. Ellas día a día trabajan por lograr sus objetivos y D. esa forma poder cumplir con el desarrollo D. cada una.
Una D. las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Eustacia, ella se dedica hace varios años a la venta D. sábanas y cortinas. Este trabajo y sacrificio que realiza es por darle a su familia todo lo mejor, ya que no quiere que ellos pasen privaciones como las que ella tuvo que pasar. 
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra D. sabanas y cortinas, con lo cual podrá aumentar su variedad y ofrecerlo a sus clientes.
texts.en:
This group is from the city of Encarnación and was formed through a contact of one of its members with the foundation.  She encouraged her friends and neighbors to join the Paraguay Foundation program.  The group is in its third cycle.  Every day they work to reach their goals and try to develop individually.

One of the members of the group is Mrs. Eustacia who has been selling sheets and curtains for several years.  The work and sacrifice she carries out are in order to give her family the best she can, since she does not want them to go without the things she had to.

She is requesting a loan to buy sheets and curtains to increase the variety of her inventory and offer it to her customers.

loans.use: To buy sheets and curtains to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Sembradoras Group

texts.es:
15 mujeres de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso se unieron con el propósito de obtener mayores ingresos para caD. una por medio del trabajo en equipo, donde la ayuD. y trabajo en conjunto es esencial.  Ellas han superado momentos difíciles como grupo pero han ido superando gracias al esfuerzo de todas por mantenerse activas en sus objetivos.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Romina, la cual se dedica hace mucho tiempo a la peluquería. Por medio de su buen trabajo y buena atención ha logrado formarse una clientela determinaD. que siempre acude hasta ella. Comenta que todo su esfuerzo es para darle lo mejor a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de tintes, kits de tijeras, gel, maquillajes y demás, los cuales son esenciales para su negocio.
texts.en:
15 women in the city of Mariono Roque Alonso joined up with the goal of making more money by working as a team, where they can help each other and collaboration is essential. They've overcome difficult moments as a group and have continued progressing thanks to all of their efforts to keep actively working towards their goals.

One of the members, Romina, has been a hairdresser for a long time. Because of her good work and good customer service, she has an established clientele that always come to her. She tells us that she works so hard in order to give her family the best. 

She asks for a loan to buy hair dyes, scissors, gel, makeup and other things that are essential to her business.

loans.use: to buy hair dyes, gel, makeup and other things.

loans.name: Oñondivepa Group

texts.es:
El comité “OÑONDIVEPA” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo. Ellas son actualmente 10 mujeres, las cuales trabajan dentro de un ambiente de coordinación y ayuda mutua para la consecución de sus fines.
Angelina se dedica a la cría y posterior venta de animales. Nos comenta que es un trabajo muy sacrificado, pues debe de estar siempre pendiente de sus animales, debe de fijarse que los mismos estén en buenas condiciones y no tengan enfermedades. Por medio de este trabajo que ella realiza logra mantener a su familia y cubrir los gastos diarios.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de animales, como así también la compra de alimentos para los mismos. Agradece a la fundación paraguaya por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Onondivepa" is made up of a group of neighbors from the city of Santani.  The members have formed a very united group that is capable of jointly carrying out activities that strengthen their camaraderie.  At present the group has 10 women who work in an environment of cooperation and mutual assistance in order to achieve their goals.

Angelina has a business raising animals to later sell.  She tells us that this work takes a lot of sacrifice, since she has to always be aware of her animals, seeing to it that they are in good condition and free of disease.  Through this work, she manages to support her family and cover her daily expenses.  

She requests a loan to buy animals, and to also buy food for them.  She is grateful to the Fundación Paraguaya for providing her with this opportunity.

loans.use: to buy animals and animal feed

loans.name: Annet

texts.en: Annet is a thirty-seven-year-old married woman with seven children who owns a house in Kasese, Uganda. She has been dealing in clothes for seven years, a business she started with capital acquired from the farming of beans and maize. Her hardships are high taxes, inflation and high transport charges. Her vision is business expansion plus educating her children. Annet needs the loan facility to enable her to buy dresses, skirts and blouses for selling at her shop.

loans.use: To buy dresses, skirts and blouses for selling at her shop.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a fifty-nine-year-old married man with three children who stays in Kasese, Uganda. He has been in milling and transport businesses for eight years. His vision is to have a coffee huller plus he wants to educate his children up to university level so that they can have a bright future. 

However, paying all of their school fees is a challenge for him, and that is why he has requested a loan from a loan facility, as most parents do for their children to access quality education. James needs the loan facility to pay school fees for his children and also to repair his motor vehicle for his transport business.

loans.use: To pay school fees for his children and also repair his motor vehicle for his transport business.
